Articles.Content:
Glorious leader Kerman Jong-Pun has entrusted you with the development of a space program to send out glorious propaganda news to the people of Kerbin. Due to the nature of the North Kerborea economy, you have only been allocated 4 Rockomax-64 fuel tanks, a small, extremely basic refinery, a basic receiving dish, and 60,000√. 

If you succeed in the space program's mission of putting (1) a small satellite, (2) a space station in LKO, or (3) a mission to either of the moons of Kerbin, you will receive the reward of not being sent to a work camp to make metal beams.

Rules: 

-You must construct a vehicle capable of transporting the fuel available to your craft via docking ports. 

-All vehicles must be built with empty fuel tanks, to be refueled on the launchpad.

-No mods except for KJR, Kerbal Engineer, and Remotetech.

-All buildings must be upgraded to level 2, except the astronaut complex. 

-1 engineer and 1 pilot is available. 

-Begin with 800 science points.

-Fuel rig must contain the most basic refinery systems (Small refinery and drill). Maximal power production is one (1) Radiothermal Isotope Generator and 4 Z100 battery packs. Your rig may produce only monopropellant or liquid fuel (no oxidizer)

-Career mode. No contracts are allowed.

-1 FL-T800 fuel tank will be provided for every 30 science collected.

-Scoring is based on (number of missions) x (average quality factor (1,2, or 3) 

Leaderboards

-

-

-

-

-

Good luck!

Edited July 24, 2016 by The Optimist
Sounds interesting! Single launch or career?

15 minutes ago, Crocket said:

Sounds interesting! Single launch or career?

As many launches as you can do with your limited resources

19 hours ago, The Optimist said:

One more question: are we allowed to hack in more than 60k to upgrade a few of our facilities?

1 minute ago, Crocket said:

One more question: are we allowed to hack in more than 60k to upgrade a few of our facilities?

Upgrade all facilities, delete all remaining funds, add in 60K
Just a little tidbit: the funds needed to upgrade all facilities to level 2 plus the 60k needed for start is 2,461,500 funds.
Pretend the facilities are already there, then start.
200 Sci isn't enough to research RTG or isru I'm thinking. How does this work?  I want to give this a try

9 minutes ago, Jetski said:

200 Sci isn't enough to research RTG or isru I'm thinking. How does this work?  I want to give this a try

I'll fix that
Alright I have an install with KER only which I will use for this.

can I make a fuel transporter, that's already fueled, but simply was fueled in the hangar? Weight constraints :/

and fours jumbo tanks are 144 tons, over the limit

Edited July 25, 2016 by Kerbiter

If multiple launches are permitted, you should probably forbid recovering a vehicle containing any fuel, or else putting an in-game time limit on the challenge, since ISRU+patience+recovery = infinite funds. 

A time limit would be interesting because players could try to balance time spent mining for extra funds vs. being able to use the mined fuel for a launch. That might be hard to balance correctly, though. 

Were I doing this challenge, the crew would ignore the mission requirements and instead build a vehicle to transport themselves to any other nation on Kerbin, to which they would defect.

Edited August 2, 2016 by gchristopher
